game.name: Car Chase
game.description:
The biggest car race game has hit your home today. Try this brand new racing game named Car Chase and get ready to make your heart pumping fast in a cool environment! Do not need to waste your time anymore as the police of the entire city are chasing you! Fasten your seatbelt and be prepared to steer the wheel in all the directions to escape from them! We know that it will be not easy at all as they are big in number. The only thing that can save you from being caught is drive regularly. 
Luckily, you are a good driver and do not lose hope easily especially when you sit behind the steering wheel. The entire road is empty except you and a horde of cops. Do not forget to collect money you find on your way while escaping to make your character and vehicle stronger than before in this one of the best racing games for boys! You can also use those coins to purchase new car models. Use the left and right arrow keys or AD to steer and Esc to pause when you play it on PC. Tap the screen when you enjoy this top down driving game in your mobile phone or tablet. 
Do your best and evade all of the attempts of the cops at stopping you! These cops are heartless and not in a mood to take you behind the bars. Try to run your car away from the cops as long time as possible! Take the needful turn on the map to make them destroy before they do the same with you! See your health status through the map that is given on the top right corner of the screen! Good luck to drive car as long as possible to set your own huge score in this one of the best html5 driving games! Play more car games online for free without downloading app or software!
